citations.narrative:
The licensee could not provide acquisition records for 2 cats acquired since their last inspection. Appropriate
documentation of acquired or disposed regulated animals is essential for proper identification, tracing forward and trace
back of the animals. Accurate and complete records of animals on hand, acquisition, and disposition need to be available
at the time of inspections. Correct by 7/16/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The licensee could not provide acquisition records for 2 cats acquired since their last inspection. Appropriate 
documentation of acquired or disposed regulated animals is essential for proper identification, tracing forward and trace 
back of the animals. Accurate and complete records of animals on hand, acquisition, and disposition need to be available 
at the time of inspections. Correct by 7/16/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
